Evangelion Gets Modern Look with RADIO EVA Apparel
Related Article
paragraph:
Evangelion apparel brand RADIO EVA is back with five new looks, modeled by the series's stars. Created around Rebuild of Evangelion, RADIO EVA mixes the show's imagery with modern street fashion. The new A/W Collection, created from the concept "ten years in the future," celebrates the tenth anniversary of the RADIO EVA brand.  The new items are available to buy from both the Evangelion Store and RADIO EVA websites. A permanent brick-and-mortar RADIO EVA store will be opening in Sapporo on October 24, as well. Additionally, a tenth anniversary RADIO EVA pop-up shop will be taking place next month at Ikebukuro P'PARCO. >> RADIO EVA Online StoreSource: Anime! Anime! ----- Kara Dennison is responsible for multiple webcomics, and is half the creative team behind the OEL light novel series Owl's Flower. She blogs at karadennison.com and tweets @RubyCosmos. Her latest work can be seen in the anthology Relics, currently available from Red Ted Books.
